# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product comes with exceptional features and quality that we're confident you'll appreciate. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I'm extending an exclusive offer for you to purchase it for $200 today. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the superior quality and functionality firsthand. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer
